title: Martin : The First Chapter
description: Aarav sees Him... hears Him... But He was killed in an accident four months ago. Is Aarav losing his mind? See the mystery unveil in this breath taking, hi-paced dark thriller, where every truth shall be unturned, every grave unbasked as revenge takes form of the ultimate truth... Aarav must prepare to face his worst nightmare... for He is back... He is MARTIN PETER GONZALES...
author: K. Hari Kumar
